SEARCH
Package com.accoladehq.calendar.slots

Class HourlySlotGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.accoladehq.calendar.slots.HourlySlotGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
SlotGenerator
@Component public class HourlySlotGenerator extends Object implements SlotGenerator
Slot generator that produces fixed hourly time slots (60 minutes each).

Slots start at the given windowStart time and continue at 60-minute intervals until (but not including) the windowEnd time. The generator ensures that:

  • Slots already booked are excluded.
  • If the given date is today, slots that have already started are excluded.

    • generateSlots

      public List<SlotDto> generateSlots(LocalDate date, LocalTime windowStart, LocalTime windowEnd, List<LocalTime> bookedStarts)
      Generates available hourly slots for the given date and time window.
      Specified by:
      generateSlots in interface SlotGenerator
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to generate slots
      windowStart - the start time of the availability window (inclusive)
      windowEnd - the end time of the availability window (exclusive for slot start)
      bookedStarts - a list of start times that are already booked
      Returns:
      a list of SlotDto objects representing available slots
